name: Main Room
descr: Warm horizontal logs give a cabin feel. To the north is the front door, you can see flurries of snow through the window. To the west is a plain wooden door. To the east is a tall staircase. In the room you see Maxtro sitting by the Mahjong table and Bean reading a book on the couch. In the kitchen, the fridge gleams silver

name: The Slot
descr: As you walk in the door, the faux gas lantern gives off an eerie glow, illuminating a cramped bunk bed. To the west is the door to the room. An sits on the floor, playing d&d.
